channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Remote professionals are quiet quitting Fridays. Their rebellion could open the door to a 4-day work week
item.description: The American Time Use Survey shows that from 2019 to 2024, the average number of minutes worked on Fridays fell by about 90 minutes in remote position...

item.title: Meet the dads choosing caring for kids over careers: ‘Men are starting to realize that missing crucial morning time and bedtime adds up’
item.description: Not a single stay-at-home father that Fortune spoke to had any regrets about swapping sending emails for changing diapers.

item.title: Metasurfaces Hit Mass Production: Cheap FaceID For Android, 3D Sensing
item.description: New metasurfaces offer richer, deeper, and more secure visual sensing. They also offer potentially massive medical benefits.

item.title: As Tokyo embraces a 4-day workweek to fight ‘death by overwork,’ Japan’s new prime minister just called a 3 a.m. meeting
item.description: The Japanese leader only sleeps two to four hours a night—and has personally pledged to ditch work-life balance in favor of “work, work, work.”

item.title: Companies and countries can stay nimble even as they navigate the ‘unexploded ordinance’ of U.S.-China competition, experts say
item.description: There's “incredibly high stakes" on the geopolitical front, foreign policy expert James Crabtree said during the Fortune Innovation Forum.

item.title: Some Good News About ‘Euphoria’ Season 3’s Release Date On HBO
item.description: What's Euphoria season 3's release date on HBO? Well, there's some surprisingly good news on that front after an interminable wait.

item.title: Logitech Data Breach — What We Know As 0-Day Hack Attack Confirmed
item.description: As Logitech confirms breach, here’s what you need to know about the Clop gang hack attack — customers and consumers likely impacted by data theft.

item.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent warns 'perfect storm' brewing as Trump eyes $2,000 payments
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent warns of a "perfect storm" brewing with Biden-era inflation and tariff solutions, as the Trump administration conside...

item.title: Today’s NYT Strands Hints, Spangram, Answers: Tuesday, November 18 (All Mixed Up)

item.description: The government could "tolerate stronger growth and higher inflation, allowing real interest rates to fall and the debt burden to shrink over time," JP...

item.title: The Four New 100% Rotten Tomatoes Scored Shows You Should Be Watching
item.description: Looking for something to watch on Netflix, HBO Max or Apple TV? Here are four 100% Rotten Tomatoes scored shows you should check out.

item.description: Google plans a $40 billion Texas data center investment, creating thousands of jobs as tech companies compete for AI infrastructure capacity.

item.title: Mortgage rates tick higher for second straight week
item.description: The average rate on the 30-year fixed mortgage rose this week to 6.24%, according to the latest Freddie Mac data released on Thursday. That is up from...

item.title: Portable mortgages explained: What they are and how they work
item.description: The Trump administration is "actively evaluating" portable mortgages to help homeowners keep low rates as home prices remains elevated.

item.title: Omaha Steaks CEO warns American families will soon face '$10-a-pound reality' for beef

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
